General.Name: João Fortes Engenharia S.A.
General.Description: João Fortes Engenharia S.A. develops, constructs, and sells real estate properties in Brazil. It is involved in the construction of residential and commercial buildings, superblocks, corporate headquarters, shopping centers, hospitals, universities, and other projects. The company was formerly known as John Strong & Cia Ltda. and changed its name to João Fortes Engenharia S.A. in September 1973. João Fortes Engenharia S.A. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Das Américas, 3443, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22631-003
